description: You can upgrade your plan by starting a free trial for 3 days and then committing to the purchase of the subscription for a defined duration. Refer: https://app.picovico.com/plans to select a preferred plan.
title: How can I upgrade my existing plan?
description_text: You can upgrade your plan by starting a free trial for 3 days and then committing to the purchase of the subscription for a defined duration. Refer: https://app.picovico.com/plans to select a preferred plan.

description: No additional charges will be imposed on closing the subscription/ account. However, you must continue to pay all fees that come due during the remainder of your subscription.
title: Will I be levied to additional charges while closing my subscription?
description_text: No additional charges will be imposed on closing the subscription/ account. However, you must continue to pay all fees that come due during the remainder of your subscription.

description: We are always willing to help any noble cause. Send us the details about your organization to support@picovico.com for flexibility in pricing.
title: Do you have any non-profit pricing?
description_text: We are always willing to help any noble cause. Send us the details about your organization to support@picovico.com for flexibility in pricing.

description:
Yes, Picovico provides API solutions. 

You can test Picovico API by signing up at http://api.picovico.com
For documentation, check http://docs.picovico.com

For further details on API, contact us at developers@picovico.com
title: Does PICOVICO offer an API?
description_text:
Yes, Picovico provides API solutions.  
 You can test Picovico API by signing up at http://api.picovico.com For documentation, check http://docs.picovico.com For further details on API, contact us at developers@picovico.com

description: You can send us an email at support@picovico.com mentioning all of your requirements and features that you would like to access through the use of Picovico. We will get back to you with the estimated cost of the requested design in not more than 2 office days.
title: How do I request for a custom API?
description_text: You can send us an email at support@picovico.com mentioning all of your requirements and features that you would like to access through the use of Picovico. We will get back to you with the estimated cost of the requested design in not more than 2 office days.
